name: Magic Force
description:
Magic Force is a 3D adventure game. You have to take on the role of a traveler who went in search of new adventures. Explore a mysterious continent that has been poisoned and help the locals find an antidote. Get on the road and fight forest and magical creatures that will become a real threat to you. Destroy magic crystals and collect all the necessary ingredients to save these lands! Chat with the locals and use magical weapons to fight back the enemies!

Peculiarities
- Colorful graphics.
- Dangerous opponents
- Great soundtrack.
